title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Kalynivka, Chasiv Yar, Stupochky of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airs...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Kalynivka, Chasiv Yar, Stupochky of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Chasiv Yar, Rozdolivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
